name: php-monitor
title: PHP Monitor
description:
Control PHP Monitor, a utility application for the Mac. Requires the integration with third-party options not to be disabled. (This option is enabled by default in PHP Monitor.) 

https://phpmon.app
author: nicoverbruggen

commands.name: switch
commands.title: Switch PHP Version
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Allows you to switch to a different PHP version.

commands.name: list
commands.title: Show Linked & Parked Domains
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Opens a list of domains registered with Valet.

commands.name: locate-config
commands.title: Locate PHP Configuration File (php.ini)
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Locates the PHP Configuration File in Finder.

commands.name: locate-composer
commands.title: Locate Global Composer File (.composer)
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Locates the Global Composer file in Finder.

commands.name: locate-valet
commands.title: Locate Valet Folder (.config/valet)
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Locates the Valet folder in Finder.

commands.name: phpinfo
commands.title: Show Current Configuration (phpinfo)
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Opens a temporary file with the output of `phpinfo()`.

commands.name: services-restart-all
commands.title: Restart All Services
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Attempts to restart all Valet services (php, nginx and dnsmasq).

commands.name: services-restart-nginx
commands.title: Restart Service: nginx
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Attempts to restart the following service: nginx.

commands.name: services-restart-dnsmasq
commands.title: Restart Service: dnsmasq
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Attempts to restart the following service: dnsmasq.

commands.name: services-restart-php
commands.title: Restart Service: php
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Attempts to restart the following service: php.

commands.name: services-stop-all
commands.title: Stop All Services
commands.subtitle: PHP Monitor
commands.description: Attempts to stop all Valet services (php, nginx and dnsmasq).
